## Initialize 
```{r, setup=TRUE}
# Set working directory
setwd("/Users/felix_pacheco/Desktop/DTU/semester4/CoDA_scRNAseq/")
getwd()

# Import libraries
library("DESeq2")
```

```{r}
# Open dataset
bulk_counts <- read.csv("data/bulk/counts_bulk.tsv", sep="\t")

bulk_counts <- subset(bulk_counts, select = -c(Gene.ID))
head(bulk_counts)
```

## Prepare Data for DESeq2 Ingestion
```{r}
metadata <- read.csv("data/bulk/metadata_bulk.tsv", sep="\t")

dds <- DESeqDataSetFromTximport(bulk_counts,
                                   colData = metadata,
                                   design = ~ condition)
```
